system.descriptionText: Vehicle has its own Life Support and is sealed from the outside. Can become exposed through Critical Damage until armour repaired, or if a hatch is opened. Also counts as Enclosed while seal is in effect.

description.value: Vehicle has its own Life Support and is sealed from the outside. Can become exposed through Critical Damage until armour repaired, or if a hatch is opened. Also counts as Enclosed while seal is in effect.
